You'll want to check with a L&S advisor, since they're oversee college requirements. The campus is closed for the week, but will re-open on Jan 3.

---

Your answer may be in the first sentence of this page https://ls.berkeley.edu/foreign-language
You'll want to check with a L&S advisor, since they're oversee college requirements. The campus is closed for the week, but will re-open on Jan 3.

I have asked the professor in charge of the Foreign Language proficiency exam what a passing score is and they told me that it depends on my department. As a current L&S CS major, what is our requirement to pass the exam? The score is given as: 1 semester fulfilled, 2 semesters fullfilled, 3..,4..., etc.
history.subject: Foreign language requirement for L&S CS
